word:
I had a very marked experience, which I hope never to forget. Through the night season I was in communion with God. I was taken out of and away from myself, and was in different States and assemblies, bearing a decided 


                                      -75- 

testimony of reproof and warning.--Manuscript 44, 1890, pp. 2-6. (Diary: "Experience at Salamanca, NY, November 1-4, 1890.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. March 1, 1979
